      • run

        public static GeneticChromosome run(GeneticDecoder decoder,
                    java.util.Properties props)
        Runs the binary genetic algorithm with the specified fitness calculator and the specified properties. This method returns the best chromosome.
        Parameters:
        decoder - genetic decoder implementation (fitness calculator)
        props - algorithm properties
        Returns:
        most optimal chromosome
